TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool MessageSurrogateFilter(string key, object value);
.class public auto ansi sealed MessageSurrogateFilter extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The key to a particular remoting message property.
The value of a particular remoting message property.
Docs.summary: Determines whether the class should ignore a particular property while creating an for a class.
Docs.returns: True if the class should ignore a particular property while creating an for a class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The MessageSurrogateFilter delegate is intended for use only by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework; you should not instantiate the delegate directly.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector.Filter%2A> property of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector> class gets and sets a MessageSurrogateFilter instance.
Each key/value parameter pair is a remoting message property that belongs to the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage.Properties%2A> property of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage> class.
